response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $1,200,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, we are extending this extraordinary offer to you at a special price of $950,000.

This is an exceptional chance to secure a valuable asset at a discounted rate, providing you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive unparalleled benefits. We understand the importance of making strategic investments that align with your business goals, and this product is precisely designed to support your growth and success.

Please let us know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. We are committed to ensuring your satisfaction and believe this product could be a pivotal addition to your business.

Looking forward to your positive response,

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
